name: HJ's Google Calendar 2018
description: this one is for my hubby - simpler background. Only works with dark backgrounds. If you want to replace the background, replace the url with your own favorite.

user.name: CloverJean
user.about: I enjoy trying something new every day. I like dabbling in code but I have tons to learn. That's why all my stuff is free. I have an adorable husband who is also intelligent, witty, charming, a cowboy, and keeps his heart close to me and God, so I keep mine close to him. I have a sweet baby that I love. My favorite quote is, "I will lead the blind by a way they know not; in paths they have not known I will guide them. I will turn darkness light before them and crooked ways straight. These things will I do for them, and I will not forsake them." God said that.
